modName: Grass On Steroids-Tamriel Reloaded Grass Patch
summary: A patch to have Tamriel Reloaded Grass densed through Grass On Steroids
descriptionHtml:
With this patch, you will be able to use Grass On Steroids on Tamriel Reloaded Grass.

[u][b]Installation[/b][/u]
1. Download [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59774/?]Tamriel Reloaded Grass[/url]
[list][*]Install it, following the guide on the Tamriel Reloaded Grass page. Use any variant you want, it doesn't matter
[/*][/list]2. Download [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33582/?]Grass On Steroids[/url]
[list][*]Install it, following the guide on the Grass On Steroids page. Use any variant you want, it doesn't matter
[/*][/list]3. Download this patch
[list][*]Install it[/*]
[*]Check the Tamriel Reloaded [b]esp[/b] in your mods list[/*]
[*]Check the Grass on Steroids [b]esp [/b]in your mods list[/*]
[*]Check the [b]GrassOnSteroids_TamrielReloadedGrass.esp [/b]in your mods list[/*]
[*]Make sure this patch is loaded [b]after[/b] the Tamriel Reloaded esp (if not, your game will crash)[/*]
[/list][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65163/?][img]http://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/65163-1-1430071785.png[/img][/url]
[b][u]Why do I need Grass On Steroids?
[/u][/b]Actually, Grass On Steroids is not required, but since this was skyrimaguas original idea, this patch will only make the grass that is [b]added [/b]through Tamriel Reloaded Grass more dense. Tamriel Reloaded does not only add new grass, it also modifies the vanilla grass, and for that to be more dense, you will[b] have to [/b]use Grass On Steroids. If that sounds confusing, simpy follow my installation instructions, and you'll be alright.
[b]
[/b][u][b]Recommendation
[/b][/u]Open your skyrim.ini file and change/add the following under [Grass]
[b]iMaxGrassTypesPerTexure=15 ; <--- 3=performance. 15=quality. Set it anywhere between
iMinGrassSize=75 ; <--- lower=denser, 75 for best look, 120 for best performance.
[/b]
You're good to go.

===============
[b]SPECIAL Thank You to [/b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/games/users/5493422/?][b]mattwoodmansee[/b][/url] forÂ  contributing to this mod by testing and providing screenshots.

author: grvulture
